issues.description: The problem statement (and UML/tasks) specify a Farm method named feedAllAnimals(), and the solution uses feedAllAnimals(), but the template's example Main() code calls farm.feed(). This name mismatch in the provided starter Main can confuse students about the correct method name/signature they should implement and may lead them to implement feed() instead of the intended feedAllAnimals().
issues.suggested_fix: Update the template Main.java to use the method name feedAllAnimals() (i.e., replace farm.feed() with farm.feedAllAnimals()), so the starter code matches the problem specification and the solution. Alternatively, if feed() is preferred, update the problem statement/UML and the solution to consistently use feed().
